channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large branch of tree cracked, 9th September
item.description:
Witnessed large truck reverse into tree, very large branch over hanging into street is now seriously cracked. Concerned this could fall into street and cause injury.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tressillian Road, Brockley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Air pollution - environmental hazard, 9th September
item.description:
Continuous outdoor grilling and heavy smoke from the shop at Arch 221 has persisted for over a year, with dense smoke often lingering for hours each day, including weekends. It affects air quality in this densely populated area, posing health risks

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Shepherds Lane, Hackney, London

item.description:

item.title: The bins at the bus stop at the Copers Cope Road Stop (Stop R) between Copers Cope and Park Road in Beckenham are always full to overflowing., 9th September
item.description:
• Please give brief details of your complaint or compliment below: The bins at the bus stop at the Copers Cope Road Stop (Stop R) between Copers Cope and Park Road in Beckenham are always full to overflowing. They are rarely, if ever, not full or overflowing. Today there was a dead fox in the bin, contributing to the generally quite awful atmosphere created by these inadequately cleaned bins. I suspect the increased traffic to Beckenham Place Park has contributed to these bins being full all the time. • What action (if any) would you like us to take? Please increase the frequency of the clearing of the bins at this area.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Copers Cope Road, New Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish all over road and no cleaner on estate, 9th September
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Rutland Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Flags attached to lamposts, 9th September
item.description:
There are multiple flags that have been attached by unauthorised individuals to a number of lampposts on Willow Vale. My councillors have asked me to report it. Please can you remove them.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Willow Grove, Chislehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegal Parking and Safety Hazards on Belz Terrace, 9th September
item.description:
Cars are regularly parked on single and double yellow lines along Belz Terrace. This happens daily and creates serious hazards, blocking visibility, limiting access for emergency vehicles, and making cycling unsafe. Can action be taken to resolve this?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Belz Terrace, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter from dumped rubbish, 9th September
item.description:
